name: nothing.seriOS
description:
This is a game made entirely by me, Hikikomori®, in 48 hours.

Game is intended for Playstation® PSP use.

Art, Music, Code by Hikikomori®

HOW TO PLAY:

Play 3 mini games togheter!

Dodge 'em all/Shooter - With arrows, dodge bullets

Skater girl - With left/right arrow, keep the balance

Motorbike girl - dodge cones with up and down

Square, Circle, Triangle, Cross - Close that nasty pop ups!
